name: MotivateMe
0:
”Alexa open Motivate Me”
”Alexa ask Motivate Me I need motivation”
”Alexa tell Motivate Me give me motivation”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: motivate me
des:
Ask for Motivate Me and instantly get a motivational quote selected from a range of quotes by the likes of Oprah Winfrey, Albert Einstein, Maya Angelou, Dalai Lama and many more!

"People often say that motivation doesn't last. Well, neither does bathing, that's why we recommend it daily." - Zig Ziglar

To start, just say "Alexa, open motivate me" or "Alexa, launch motivate me" to get a motivational quote.

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
